level.heading: Sunset provision.
level.text: If the Foundation has returned monies deposited in the Fund pursuant to § 10-1333(h), the Foundation shall cease all operations.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1331.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-180
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-180, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1331.
